column1: a movie that will thrill you , touch you and make you laugh as well
though overall an overwhelmingly positive portrayal , the film ignore the fun aspects of life
the film is so busy making reference to other films and trying to be other films that it fails to have a heart , mind or humor of its own
a movie that will make you smile all day long
this is very much of a mixed genres , with enough negatives humor to outweigh the positives
